@bustervic @ElizabethMay Of course. Seeking justice for refugees and seeking what's best for Canada are not mutually exclusive concepts.

@bustervic @ElizabethMay Agree that discussing this is important. If your 1 million people scenario was in any way possible, I would agree this would be concerning. However, because Canada is geographically isolated, it is a literal impossibility that a million people would show up here seeking asylum.

Kim Phuc is a Canadian national hero. Denying her brother a visa to visit his dying mother in Canada is shameful after everything they've been through. This family deserves better. Please share the video link. https://t.co/EAtU4VnRYS https://t.co/87QSDmtfMU
